publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1484 Angus MacKay: Housing (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution-That the Parliament for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Housing (Scotland) Bill, agrees to- (a) the expenditure out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund of the expenses of the Scottish Ministers in consequence of the Act; and (b) any charge imposed on, and any payment required to be made by, any person by or under the Act. Supported by: Jackie Baillie*

S1M-1484 Angus MacKay: Housing (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution—That the Parliament for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Housing (Scotland) Bill, agrees to— (a) the expenditure out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund of the expenses of the Scottish Ministers in consequence of the Act; and (b) any charge imposed on, and any payment required to be made by, any person by or under the Act. Supported by: Jackie Baillie

S1M-1484 Angus MacKay: Housing (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution—That the Parliament for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Housing (Scotland) Bill, agrees to— (a) the expenditure out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund of the expenses of the Scottish Ministers in consequence of the Act; and (b) any charge imposed on, and any payment required to be made by, any person by or under the Act. Supported by: Jackie Baillie
